title: Coronation Street spoilers: Sinead discovers Daniel and Bethany's secret tonight
text:
Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) has been enjoying the little time she’s got left in Coronation Street, but she’s about to get a devastating blow in tonight’s episode, as the truth about Daniel Osbourne’s (Rob Mallard) feelings for Bethany Platt (Lucy Fallon) come to light in a shocking fashion after she discovers the young woman’s notebook.

Earlier this week, Beth (Lisa George), Craig (Colson Smith), and Kirk (Andrew Whyment) took it upon themselves to throw Sinead one final Christmas celebration. Sinead was delighted with her family’s idea, but Daniel wasn’t too pleased about the whole thing, as he believed his wife was simply too ill for such a celebration — and his overprotectiveness ended up causing problems, which resulted in Sinead ordering him out of their home.

Emotional and upset, Daniel broke down in the ginnel. Bethany spotted him and — after consoling him — the pair ended up sharing a passionate kiss.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Afterwards, Daniel was wracked with guilt over his actions and, tonight, the truth of his dalliance with Bethany comes to light. Yes, as Sinead reaches for her notebook, she ends up picking up Bethany’s by mistake. As a result, she opens and proceeds to read.

Later, Daniel returns home and Sinead confronts him with her discovery. After reading Bethany’s short story, she’s convinced that she’s in love with him, and Daniel makes every effort to deny such a thing — but Sinead simply doesn’t believe him.

She begs him to be honest with her — and eventually he complies.

Afterwards, Sinead can’t look at her husband.

Is this the end of the pair’s relationship?

Coronation Street continues on Wednesday 23rd October at 7:30pm and 8:30pm on ITV.

description: Daniel makes a revelation — and Sinead's left reeling as a result.
